answers.answer: HiThanks for writing to the forum!There are two things you must definitely look at. One is diabetes and the other is hypothyroidism. Weird taste in mouth and nausea could be due to GERD or acid reflux. Anemia too can cause tiredness. Do discuss this with your doctor and get yourself examined.There are many cancer markers in the blood. Many labs run a cancer screening test. You can talk to your doctor regarding this.Hope this helps. Please let me know if there is any thing else and do keep me posted. Take care!
